name: word4you
title: Word4You
description: Learn English words with AI-powered explanations using Google Gemini
author: zouzheng

commands.name: learn-word
commands.title: Learn Word
commands.subtitle: Word4You
commands.description: Learn an English word with AI explanation and save to vocabulary

preferences.name: executablePath
preferences.title: Word4You Executable Path
preferences.description: Path to the word4you executable (optional, defaults to extension directory)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
